channel.title: DNS hosting?
channel.description:
I need new DNS hosting in the next few days, and I'm looking for suggestions. I've been with editdns.net for years, paying $5/month for unlimited domains and have had great service, but now dyndns bought them out, and wants $30/year per domain name, which is ridiculous. My only real requirement is they must support TXT records, anyone got a good host they use?
To clarify, I don't want to transfer my domains, I just want straight DNS hosting.
edit: I also like how I set moparisthebest.org for instance as a clone of moparisthebest.com, so I just have to update records in 1 place, instead of for each domain.
